name: 江雅綺
objective: In light of the challenges posed by the digital age, this course is aimed at helping students explore the IP legal issues with reference to the media evolution and content regulation on the internet. Topics for discussion will include the changing future of the internet, the line between the public and private sphere, the reforms on copyright regimes and the Big Data developments.
